Erub Island is a locality in the Torres Strait Island Region, Queensland, Australia. The locality contains only Darnley Island (also known as Erub Island). In the , Erub Island had a population of 326 people.
Demographics
In the , Erub Island had a population of 328 people.
In the , Erub Island had a population of 326 people.
Education
Tagai State College operates across 17 campuses on the Torres Strait Islands. The Darnley Island has a primary (Early Childhood-6) campus of Tagai State College ().
